attributes.action: Complete refurbishment of Kew Library and Extend the opening hours to Monday - Saturday 10am - 6pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kew Library is a tiny shabby and small it is only open tues weds and Friday for half days except tuesday. There are 8 primary schools within a two mile radius of the library and at least 4 care homes for the eldery all of which would benefit from a well managed and well funded library.
